entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is about to face Snape in a mental duel. (Extracted from: 'Harry got to his feet feeling nervous.')

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is attempting to break into Harry's mind using Legilimency. (Extracted from: 'said Snape softly.')

relationships.description: Harry and Snape are facing each other in a mental duel, with Snape attempting to break into Harry's mind. (Extracted from: 'They faced each other with the desk between them.')
